summary: This is a combination of all my retextures packed into 1 file, Now with added weapon textures
descriptionHtml:
I decided to do a retexture of the brilliant dragon bone weapons made by AeonVita in the style of my other retextures.

Now all neatly packed into 1 file

-Required download
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1935 (dragon bone weapons, download and install first)

-Optional download
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2374 (Jagged crown retexture)

This file includes retextures of the following;
-Dragon bone armor (http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2153)
-Dragon scale armor (http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2335)
-Dragon bone weapons (new)
-Dragon bone      )
-Dragon scale       } (http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3154)
-Dragon skeleton )
-Dragon (basic) (new)

All these are made by Wierdcon
(antlerloop is the group I work with)
author: Wierdcon
